reviewText: If you're new, you might want to get into the uprock part of hip hop dancing before trying to tackle this one, things get pretty difficult and athletic quickly. The moves come hard & fast, so prepare to do a lot of stopping and re-watching. They do NOT waste any time, like many other dance DVDs do.
It teaches each move step for step it's a great tool for anyone who wants to learn how to break at their own pace.
not what i expect.....ive watch it but didn't try it yet.....i don't know if i will be able to do the moves, even if im a dance teacher and a instructor.....
Had bought a Breakin it video for my son and that was okay, but this one is better to me.  Hope you enjoy.

Its a well made video with good examples explained easily by the instructors. Very up beat and also good for work outs
which is what I use it for.
The video is good...but like anything else, it is taking me years to learn to do a windmill...that's ok....that's life.
Have had others...this one is the bomb...this is the one u want to learn from.
I found this dvd to be GREAT for learning how to breakdance.
